T02TD1459E:5b-1: shr'i sa ha dza sam ba ra sva tishtha nam n'a ma /
T02TD1459E:5b-3: dpal lhan cig skyes ba bde pa'i mchog / bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1459E:5b-5: rnal 'byor rnam gsum zhes bya ste //
T02TD1459E:5b-6: byin gyis brlab dang rang rtags dang //
T02TD1459E:5b-7: rdzogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bsam med do //
T02TD1459E:5b-8: sna tshogs gzugs can yid du 'ong //
T02TD1459E:5b-9: yid bzhin nor bu'i gzugs 'chang ma //
T02TD1459E:5b-10: zin na dngos grub chen po 'byung //
T02TD1459E:5b-11: chos bshad nas ni dbang du bya //
T02TD1459E:5b-12: yang na ri ba'i rin gyis slu //
T02TD1459E:5b-13: shin tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa pos //
T02TD1459E:5b-14: dbang gis yongs su smin pa dang //
T02TD1459E:5b-15: lha lhar bltas la dngos grub blang //
T02TD1459E:5b-16: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar //
T02TD1459E:5b-17: gsal la 'dzin med bde ba'i sku //
T02TD1459E:5b-18: nyi shu rtsa lnga yum rnams rdzogs //
T02TD1459E:5b-19: bltas dang dgong dang 'khrig pa yis //
T02TD1459E:5b-20: mkha' sbyor bde ba'i pho brang du //
T02TD1459E:5b-21: dbang gi rgyal pos gar byas pas //
T02TD1459E:5b-22: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun dgyes //
T02TD1459E:5b-23: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dgyes pa'i glu //
T02TD1459E:5b-24: aam dang ham gi sgra brjod pas //
T02TD1459E:5b-25: tshangs pa'i ri bo rtse nas nyil //
T02TD1459E:5b-26: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba bltams pa dang //
T02TD1459E:5b-27: gnas pa bzhi yi ri ma pa yis //
T02TD1459E:5b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1459E:5b-29: dbang phyug dam pa'i gsang gtam 'dis //
T02TD1459E:6a-0: nam mkha' rdo rje grong du 'jug bde chen dag pa'i zhing @6a * //
T02TD1459E:6a-2: thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i sku //
T02TD1459E:6a-3: shes rab rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1459E:6a-4: gnyis med bde pa'i rnam pa can //
T02TD1459E:6a-5: ma ning zhes byar brjod pa ste //
T02TD1459E:6a-7: sgrib pa dang bral chos sku 'dir //
T02TD1459E:6a-8: rakta la sogs byang sems rnams //
T02TD1459E:6a-9: rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid kyi //
T02TD1459E:6a-11: dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1459E:6a-12: rgyal po aindra bh'u ti 'bring pos mdzad pa /
T02TD1459E:6a-13: rje mi nyag chen pos bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
